# Article Submission {.unnumbered}

The *Journal of Sustainable Technology in Agriculture (JOSTA)* welcomes manuscript submissions from researchers, academics, and professionals from any fields of Agricultural research. We are committed to publishing high-quality, peer-reviewed articles that advance knowledge and practice in sustainable technology.

## Submission Process {.unnumbered}

```{=html}
<div class="submission-container">
  <p>We are currently developing an automated submission system specifically for JOSTA to streamline the manuscript submission process. In the meantime, please submit your manuscripts by emailing them to <a href="mailto:jostapubs@gmail.com">jostapubs@gmail.com</a>.</p>
  <p>Please ensure your submission adheres to the following guidelines:</p>
  <ul>
    <li>Manuscripts should be submitted Word or qmd format.</li>
    <li>Include a cover letter with the manuscript title, author names, affiliations, and contact information.</li>
    <li>Follow the journal's formatting and style guidelines (available on the <a href="/author-guidelines">Author Guidelines</a> page).</li>
    <li>Ensure all co-authors are listed and have approved the submission.</li>
    <li>Include any supplementary materials or datasets as separate attachments.</li>
  </ul>
  <p>Upon receipt, our editorial team will confirm submission and provide further instructions regarding the peer-review process.</p>
</div>
```

## Contact Information {.unnumbered}

```{=html}
<div class="submission-container">
  <p>For any questions regarding the submission process, please contact the editorial office at <a href="mailto:jostapubs@gmail.com">jostapubs@gmail.com</a>.</p>
  <p>We look forward to receiving your contributions to *JOSTA* and supporting the advancement of sustainable technology in agriculture.</p>
```
